downloadTitle: Skype for Business Server, Real-Time Statistics Manager (64-bit)
downloadDescription: This download includes the three (3) packages necessary to deploy Skype for Business Server, StatsMan.
detailsSection: Skype for Business Server, Real-Time Statistics Manager (StatsMan) makes it possible to monitor key performance indicators for Skype for Business Server in real-time.  This download includes the StatsMan Agent, Listener and Website installation packages necessary for a functional StatsMan deployment.
systemRequirementsSection:
Please see Skype for Business Server 2019 System Requirements on docs.microsoft.com

Skype for Business Server, StatsMan has the following additional requirements:
  • Support Skype for Business Server:
    • Skype for Business Server 2019
    • Skype for Business Server 2015
    • Lync Server 2013
  • Listener/Website computer, with the following requirements:
    • Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server 2019
    • .NET 4.5 or later
    • redis 3.2 or later
  • Agent computer, with the following requirements:
    • Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server 2019
    • .NET 4.5 or later
installInstructionSection:
Refer to planning documentation here: Plan for Statistics Manager in Skype for Business Server

Refer to deployment documentation here: Deploy Statistics Manager in Skype for Business Server

Refer to upgrade documentation here: Upgrade Statistics Manager in Skype for Business Server
